thread.title: Now Sangeet Marathi for TV buffs
thread.title_full: Now Sangeet Marathi for TV buffs - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Now Sangeet Marathi for TV buffs
text:
The tele viewers will soon get to enjoy a special Marathi music channel now.
The channel named Sangeet Marathi, is being launch is part of Media Worldwide's expansion plans. Along with Sangeet Marathi, the company also plans to launch a slew of music channels for the Indian audience.
Media Worldwide has roped in film and TV actor/filmmaker Deepak Dewoolkar as Chief Creative Director for Sangeet Marathi. Dewoolkar has played the lead part in Marathi movies like 'Vaat Pahte Punvechi', 'Janmadaata', 'Pratidav', 'Navra Majya Muthit Ga', and 'Maza Saubhagya' among 70 other films and in more than 40 Hindi television series.
Commenting on Dewoolkar's appointment, Nisha Chothani, Director, Media Worldwide, said, "Deepak Dewoolkar brings extensive expertise to our channel and will play a key role in creating the kind of content that appeals to our audience. His knowledge of Marathi music and cinema will be extremely beneficial to our channel highlighting the exuberance of the Maharashtrian culture."
ALSO READ: ANURAG KASHYAP PROMOTES MARATHI FILM
Prashant Chothani, Managing Director, Media Worldwide, added here, "In an attempt to meet with the expectations of our audience, we decided to bring an expert on the Marathi entertainment industry on board. Deepak Dewoolkar brings a different point of view, that of the audience, to the table. His knowledge will help us design content that is at par with the choices of the viewers. We are extremely excited with this alliance and get an insight into his perspective."
